channel.title: Dark bow spec damage low (Delta) (repping)
channel.description:
hello can someone help me with this ima rep u my dark bow hits from 0-24 max it dont hit in 30's how i can make it hit 30's? i tryed everything but all fails
like example
if ur lvl 60 ranged u hit 20-30 and if ur over 75 (30-35) if ur 85 ranged (30-45) if ur 99 ranged (30-50) how i can make it like that such as other bows but good damge?
please help me and i want it 100% working
Repping

item.title: Dark bow spec damage low (Delta) (repping)
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

epic yes you can .
change the maxhit(12); calc / by changing the 12 to like 45 since max hit is 45 in rs .
and to get it to config with levels just make a loop .

Read full topic

item.title: Dark bow spec damage low (Delta) (repping)
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“3lou 55, post:1, topic:300710”]hello can someone help me with this ima rep u my dark bow hits from 0-24 max it dont hit in 30’s how i can make it hit 30’s? i tryed everything but all fails

like example

if ur lvl 60 ranged u hit 20-30 and if ur over 75 (30-35) if ur 85 ranged (30-45) if ur 99 ranged (30-50) how i can make it like that such as other bows but good damge?

please help me and i want it 100% working

Repping[/quote]
You can’t REALLY help normal hit damage, without giving it strength/magic/range attack bonuses to boost the power.
Specials on the other hand, you can manipulate to hit a certain ONE number, or a mix of a few.
If you have teamviewer, I can help you out with this manually.
Harder to explain than to show.

TeamViewer

TeamViewer – Remote Support, Remote Access, Service Desk, Online Collaboration...

Remote desktop access solutions by TeamViewer: connect to remote computers, provide remote support & collaborate online ➤ Free for personal use!


Look in my sig for details on how to connect to me.
Capital F on Furry.

–Search the other Bow ID’s and look for something relating to special in client.java.

Read full topic
